title.rendered: THE TEN SPOT ontario | toronto | summerhill

content.rendered:
beauty bar in ontario | toronto | summerhill | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in summerhill, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in ontario | toronto | summerhill | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 1355 yonge st
  • 437-880-4568
  • summerhill@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

So happy to have tried out this place. Valeria was kind, attentive and made some great recommendations after my facial. My skin is glowing, thank you. I will definitely be back!
Amanda WY
1722450145
Great atmosphere, and very friendly staff. I had my first facial from Valeria, and it didn't disappoint. Scents were amazing and it was relaxing, to the point I was almost in a dream state. My wife and daughter had their nails done, and both came out with amazing results. The owner, Christina, was... super friendly and informative. Definitely recommend to anybody who's interested in some self care and a day of pampering!!read more
Andre Bharti
1721679449
It was my first time at the Ten Spot & I thought that it was very good. Ranju did my manicure & pedicure & was great!
D'Arcy Robert
1720049001
I did the underarm laser hair removal and it was so quick and easy. Jasmine was lovely as it was my first time. She took the time to explain what she was going to to and what to expect. It was over in minutes and not painful at all! I am totally coming back to this 10 Spot!! April 2023.So I... have gone back to the 10 spot summerhill several times this past year and just remembered I should update my review.I went back for a pedi in Dec 2023 and May 2024 and they were both great. My feet were in bad shape and I felt terrible for the nail technicians. They did an amazing job and my feet were so smooth and the polish job was so nice.I did go for a facial this weekend with Val. We did a super fun girls spa day with 4 of us. I admit I felt so relaxed during the hand and arm massage I did fall asleep. I came out and my friends said I was glowing.read more
Maggie Tse
1718111870
Christina gave me a Gel Mani. It was my first time going to The Ten Spot and my first time getting a Gel Mani. It turned out perfectly and Christina did an amazing job with my nasty overgrown cuticles. which was a focus for me. The shop is immaculate, friendly and very professional. All good. I'll... be back.read more
Jo-Ann Joseph
1717261549
Francesca, Christine fabulous. Staff are friendly and helpful and honest. Francesca has an amazing amount of knowledge and gives tremendous advice about skin and products. Thank you. Cynthia Karlton
cynthia karlton
1715467110
A lot of care and concern is taken to keep this environment spotlessly clean and welcoming. The services are all top notch, I have had too many to mention. Very courteous staff.
Michelle Jalsevac
1714572825
Quick, efficient, ALWAYS friendly and great hospitality! This is the only place I go in the city to ensure my nails aren’t hurt, filed down or damaged. I would recommend to anyone interested in a shellac mani or pedi.
Becca Emery
1713096216
Had a facial at this location. Amazing service, facility is beautiful and clean. I left feeling relaxed and totally rejuvenated. Could not be happier 🙂
Shawna Butler
1706122197
I've been in twice for a manicure with Valeria and then with Gale. The staff are friendly, and the atmosphere is clean & vibrant. The owner, Christina, was very generous in making me feel welcome. It's so lovely to have this location open up close to home.I also had a facial treatment with... Christina, which felt like the way a child wants to be pampered by its parent. I could have stayed relaxing all day; I did not want my treatment to end.read more
Rachel J
1705020914
Francesca at The Ten Spot (Summerhill) gave me an amazing, stellar facial! Her touch is perfect, and the accompanying massage was to die for. I just got home, and I've already booked my next appointment!
Laurie Januska
1704481936
I had the best BIAB gel manicure today done by Shawana! She was so gentle and meticulous, and took her time to make sure every nail was perfect. My nails have never felt better! The place was also very clean and spotless, which is so important. Can’t wait to return!
Katie Jones
1700431144
Though I have visited other locations of the Ten Spot in the past, it was my first time at the Ten Spot Summerhill. I met Amanda for my pedicure appointment and she had such a kind and pleasant manner. Her work was excellent! She gave so much attention to detail in making sure my feet looked great!... I really appreciated that. We had a wonderful conversation during the appointment as well. Overall, I was so pleased with my experience at the Ten Spot Summerhill and will definitely be returning! I also got to meet the owner of this particular location at the cash desk who really took the time to hear my positive experience. Highly recommend the Ten Spot Summerhill!read more
Nauman Mir
1694866754
Absolutely love this location! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted warmly and well taken care of. I've seen Christina three times now - twice for gel manicures and once for a pedicure and couldn't be happier with the results - the whole experience, really. She's a delight to talk with and... a genius with nail art. I just pick out colours and let her creativity and skill take the lead!read more
Sarena Seifer
1692962312
I had been to the Yonge and Lawrence Ten Spot and decided to try the new one near my home. I was greeted Christina and her staff and provided with refreshments, and a friendly atmosphere. The place is spotless. My pedicure and manicure were excellent. I loved the wax treatment on my toes. It is... more expensive than other salons with non-English speaking staff, but well worth it.read more
Marianne LoPresti
1689097972
‹
›
